page.title: 15SARAH'S DAY CONTINUED
page.content: 3.30pm End of school,bell rang, class said prayers. Walked home,watched television, Childrens ITV. 5.30 Ate tea of chicken & chips. 6.30 Went to ballet at sports hall we practiced for an exam; the exam was Grade 2.We did a lot of barre work. 7.O5 Played with Sara we played on our bicycles then we pretended to be hippies, first we got two hairbands each & we put our hair up.Then we got Sarah's taperecorder & went outside with music booming out. We were dancing & running round the house. 8.00pm Watched Dallas on T.V. 9.05pm Read a book called Brownie Entertainers, time for bed.
